item.title: Searching for files?
item.description: Nobody is a exception for searching files unless you don’t have a computer. here are two commands you must learn if you are a beginner. find command $ find /path/ -name file_name example: $ find . -name "date*" Notice the ‘.’ which says search in the current directory for files starting with “date” , you can use your regular expression skill here. And you if you want to search for file starting from the root just replace ‘.
